titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate the exclusion for qualified transportation provided by employers.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/11/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore, as of tax year 1987, the income tax exclusion for the value of qualified commuter transportation provided to an employee by his or her employer. (Under current law the exclusion expired after tax year 1985.)
